name: OpenAI Assistant
semantic_context: Utilizes Assistant API from Open AI.
natural_language_description: 这是 OpenAI Assistant 节点。主要用于: Utilizes Assistant API from Open AI.

mode.name: mode
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: existing

instructions.name: instructions
instructions.description: How the Assistant and model should behave or respond
instructions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Instructions | 作用: How the Assistant and model should behave or respond

model.name: model
model.description: The model which will be used to power the assistant. Learn more. The Retrieval tool requires gpt-3.5-turbo-1106 and gpt-4-1106-preview models.
model.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 作用: The model which will be used to power the assistant. Learn more. The Retrieval tool requires gpt-3.5-turbo-1106 and gpt-4-1106-preview models. | 默认值: gpt-3.5-turbo-1106 | (必填项)

assistantId.name: assistantId
assistantId.description: The assistant to use. Learn more.
assistantId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Assistant | 作用: The assistant to use. Learn more. | (必填项)

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 默认值: ={{ $json.chatInput }} | (必填项)

nativeTools.name: nativeTools
nativeTools.natural_language_description: 参数名: OpenAI Tools | 默认值: []

noticeTools.displayName: Upload files for retrieval using the <a href="https://platform.openai.com/playground" target="_blank">OpenAI website<a/>
noticeTools.name: noticeTools
noticeTools.natural_language_description: 参数名: Upload files for retrieval using the <a href="https://platform.openai.com/playground" target="_blank">OpenAI website<a/>

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 作用: Additional options to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: baseURL (值: None) - Override the default base URL for the API
maxRetries (值: None) - Maximum number of retries to attempt
timeout (值: None) - Maximum amount of time a request is allowed to take in milliseconds

output_contract.standardizer_logic: return { payload: { primary: upstream.choices?.[0]?.message?.content || upstream.text || upstream } }
